version_description:
Here we are ! Tons of new features with the 3.0.8 version update :

- The geolocation permission supports iOS11
- Multi-currency is now available
- The application now supports Cyrillic
- Logs on geolocation errors
- Crash details of the application
- Bug fix about Facebook Connect

Here we are ! Tons of new features with the 3.0.8 version update :

- The geolocation permission supports iOS11
- Multi-currency is now available
- The application now supports Cyrillic
- Logs on geolocation errors
- Crash details of the application
- Bug fix about Facebook Connect

MOBEYE IS READY TO TAKE ON THE WORLD!
We're coming to the US and the UK! After filling the pockets of hundreds of thousands of our French, Belgian, German, Dutch or Spanish users, we're ready to conquer the country of Uncle Sam and the one of Queen Elisabeth. Living across the Atlantic or across the Channel? Missions are now available in your country!

A SURPRISE FOR OUR NEW USERS
The Mobeye family is always ready to welcome new members. And to make them feel at home right away, we have completely rethink the way they join us. The great new design is going to blow the mind of the new kids on the block!

READY FOR THE IPHONE X
Proud owners of the iPhone X, you are not forgotten! Mobeye is now ready for the new shiny borderless screen of the latest phone from the company in Cupertino.

ALWAYS STRONGER
An update is always a good opportunity to make the app stronger than ever to enable you to complete the missions swift as lightning. That way, you will find many optimizations:
• Filters are back!
• Your current mission is now displayed on the map (so you can find it more easily)
• Issue while sending your mission? You can now try to resend it!

WHERE ARE THE BUGS?
And, like in every update of every app of the world, our devs were so happy to kill every bugs they could find. Bugs are an endangered specie
at Mobeye. Found one? Tell us at contact@mobeye-app.com

And you, what's your next mission?

MULTI PHOTOS
This update will allow you to take severals pictures to answer one same question. Quite convenient!

MOBEYE ARRIVES IN ASIA
We just added a new country to our list : South Korea! So if you're suddenly taken by a need of exoticism, you'll find us in the Land of the Morning Calm.
Several bugs have been solved in order to improve your experience on the app, while executing a mission :). Found another one? Reach us at contact@mobeye-app.com.
And you, what's your next mission?

BIEF PREVIEW
You hesitate to book a mission because you would like to know more about it? With the brief preview, you’ll be able to check if this mission is made for you ! This update will gradually be available for all the users.

NO MERCY FOR THE BUGS
A bug resulting from the update of the multi-photos has been spotted and we immediately eradicated it.

HAUNTING THE BUGS 
After the latest updates, some bugs appeared on the app. We worked hard and they now disappeared. You can now peacefully use the app.

Found another one? Reach us at contact@mobeye-app.com

BE THE MASTER OF YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS
If the email address associated to your Mobeye account doesn’t suit you anymore, you can now change it directly in the app : menu “Profile”!

WELCOMING ALL THE IPHONES X
We adapted the app to fit all the specifications for all the iPhones X, XS, XS Max and XR.

BUG CORRECTIONS
Found another one? Reach us at contact@mobeye-app.com

What will be your next mission?

E-MAIL
Until now Mobeye didn’t allow to check your e-mail, now it’s possible. This will avoid false addresses or typing errors. You can then modify it from the app settings on the "Profile" page.

BUGS HUNTING
Various bugs have been corrected with this update.
This update solves a localisation issue.
